mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.userid AS "userid", a.username AS "username", a.touserid AS "touserid", a.content AS "content", a.isnotice AS "isnotice", a.noticetime AS "noticetime", a.firtype AS "firtype", a.sectype AS "sectype", a.isread AS "isread"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO social_msg( id, userid, username, touserid, content, isnotice, noticetime, firtype, sectype, isread ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userid}, #{username}, #{touserid}, #{content}, #{isnotice}, #{noticetime}, #{firtype}, #{sectype}, #{isread} )
mapper.update: UPDATE social_msg SET userid = #{userid}, username = #{username}, touserid = #{touserid}, content = #{content}, isnotice = #{isnotice}, noticetime = #{noticetime}, firtype = #{firtype}, sectype = #{sectype}, isread = #{isread} WHERE id = #{id}
